tool_description: Classifies demand patterns into categories like smooth, intermittent, lumpy, or erratic to guide appropriate forecasting method selection.

classification_method.description: Classification approach: cv_adi, syntetos_boylan, or advanced_ml

error_messages: Insufficient demand history: Need at least 12 periods of data for reliable classification
Invalid classification method: Use cv_adi, syntetos_boylan, or advanced_ml
Invalid demand values: All demand values must be non-negative numbers
usage: Input demand_history array and select classification_method. Tool categorizes the demand pattern to guide forecasting approach.

pattern_category.description: Demand pattern category: smooth, intermittent, lumpy, erratic

recommended_methods.description: Recommended forecasting methods for this pattern
